title: சாலையில் சிலம்பம் சுழற்றிய இந்த பாட்டி தமிழகத்தைச் சேர்ந்தவரா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
Shantabai Pawar says, "By God's grace, I am able to perform at this age and sustain my livelihood. My grandchildren are pursuing their studies and we are happy."



85-year-old Shantabai Pawar performs 'Lathi Kathi' on streets of Pune to earn a livelihood. pic.twitter.com/BWx9tOaF04
